fun.connor.lighter.undertow

Class UndertowRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.undertow.UndertowRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request

    public class UndertowRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements Request
    Implementation of Request backed by an Undertow HttpServerExchange. This implementation defers loading the request body until it is required.
